title: sArasa lOcana
sahitya:
sArasa lOcana mAmava bhO dayayAmalatam sarasijanAbha


anupallavi

  nIraja shara sundara nikhila vibudha muni bhayahara


caraNam 1    pApa samUha vibhanjana pArvika sOma samAnana-mApa nivArita dAnava mAnya guNAti manOhara
    caraNam 2    bhOgi varENya vAsa vibhO kamalAana pUjita nAga bhayApaha pAvana nAma nikAya murAntaka
    caraNam 3    shESapurIshvara mAdhava sEvaka mangaLa dAyaka 
bhASaNa vijita sudhArasa paTala bimba phalAdhara
